supportingMedia.value:
To be exposed to this issue an interface need to be configured as follows:

  [ routing-options multicast stream-protection ]

configuration.value:
To be exposed to this issue an interface need to be configured as follows:

  [ routing-options multicast stream-protection ]

supportingMedia.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

exploit.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

supportingMedia.value:
The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue:
Junos OS: 19.4R3-S9, 20.2R3-S7, 20.3R3-S5, 20.4R3-S6, 21.1R3-S4, 21.2R3-S2, 21.3R3-S1, 21.4R3, 22.1R1-S2, 22.1R2, 22.2R2, 22.3R1, and all subsequent releases;
Junos OS Evolved: 20.4R3-S6-EVO, 21.3R3-S1-EVO, 21.4R3-EVO, 22.1R1-S2-EVO, 22.1R2-EVO, 22.2R2-EVO, 22.3R1-EVO , and all subsequent releases.
There are no known workarounds for this issue.

work_around.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.
